mutants.code:
import re

def password_strength(password):
    length_error = len(password) <= 8
    digit_error = re.search('\\d', password) is None
    uppercase_error = re.search('[A-Z]', password) is None
    lowercase_error = re.search('[a-z]', password) is None
    symbol_error = re.search('\\W', password) is None
    password_ok = not (length_error or digit_error or uppercase_error or lowercase_error or symbol_error)
    password_strength = {'Password valid': password_ok, 'Length >= 8': not length_error, 'Contains digits': not digit_error, 'Contains uppercase': not uppercase_error, 'Contains lowercase': not lowercase_error, 'Contains symbols': not symbol_error}
    return password_strength
